snippet.title: The Perils of Willy - Vic-20 +16k - Real Hardware
snippet.description:
With the help of the Vic-20 Denial forum, I've finally managed to get a proper version of this that works on a real Vic-20 (that isn't loaded off tape).  There are loads of versions (prg and d64 files) that work in VICE, but on the Vic they either give you extra lives every time you collect a note, or the lives work and the score is corrupt and the music won't play (what do you mean, "that's a good thing"?).
So here is a play through to level 13.  There are 32 levels in total, though the instructions say 33 for some reason.
I spared you Stairway to Heaven after the first level, as it's a bit repetitive.
F3 and F5 turn the music off/on, F1 pauses, and Ctrl continues and also starts the game.
You get an extra life at 5,000, then every 10,000 after that (15,000, 25,000, etc.)
